title: The Vanguard
description: She knows what it means to be Elect. The Vanguard are an entirely different breed.In the wake of tragedy, Allison Noble finds herself surrounded: hunted by enemies she never knew she had, protected by strangers she isn’t sure she can trust. Her options are limited. She can stay, and put her life in unfamiliar hands…or honor the promise she gave her mother to track down Phillip Noble. Questioning friendships, testing loyalties, Allison strikes out on her own. But as her powers grow, and new potential is revealed, the danger she ran away from is never far behind
author: Elle Todd
